thread.title: I love acting with Jayaram: Kaniha
thread.title_full: I love acting with Jayaram: Kaniha - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: I love acting with Jayaram: Kaniha
text:
Kaniha has shared screen space with all the bigshots of Mollywood such as Mammootty, Mohanlal, Jayaram and Suresh Gopi.
However, Jayaram seems to be her favourite among the lot. In a recent interview, the actress revealed that she likes acting with Jayaram the best, as he also brings in a lot a fun to the set.
She added that she never feels tensed, while acting with him. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
